Official FAQ

Why is everything upside down? ▼
By Supreme Decree #7 ("The Floor Is Now The Ceiling"), all state-operated commerce shall be conducted in inverted orientation. This is not a bug. This is governance.
Can the jazz band take a break? ▼
No. Decree #12 ("Perpetual Groove") mandates continuous live jazz accompaniment for all state activities including but not limited to: shopping, napping, tantrums, and snack distribution. Gerald has been playing since March.
What is your return policy? ▼
Returns were abolished under Decree #3 ("No Takebacks"). All sales are final. Complaints may be submitted via crayon on the provided Blank Decree parchment and will be reviewed during the next cabinet meeting (scheduled: after snack time, maybe).
Is the Supreme Leader actually a toddler? ▼
The Supreme Leader is 28 months of age and holds absolute authority over this domain, the living room, and most of the backyard. Further questions about leadership qualifications will be referred to Comrade Bear.
